Raw Sugar Natural Hand Wash Raw Coconut + Mango

works to restore moisture and nourish dry skin, while the mango uplifts and brightens skin tone – a pure but powerful fusion.

all the nutrients it needs and then some – leaving hands feeling refreshed, replenished and reinvigorated.

Good for you and the earth, 25% of Raw Sugar's bottle packaging is made out of post-consumer recycled materials, and our bottle pumps are sustainably-sourced natural bamboo. We believe a clean world starts at home, so as part of the Raw Sugar Initiative-a fresh bar of soap is donated to a family in need for ever product sold.
